title: PLZ HELP FPS PROBLEM SCINCE WINDOWS UPDATE
body: ok i have uninstalled the x box app but im still getting fps issues any help at all would do

replies.body: Disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) is a solid troubleshooting step, but fps issues can be caused by other things as well like outdated drivers.  Check out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC and make sure your drivers are in order.  Hopefully that will do the trick!
except they wont because i have the same issue they just ban and get over it
